bibl.title: On the Life of Aesop: A Clarification.
bibl.note: Replies to: Rosa Giannattasio, Su due recenti papiri della Vita di Esopo, ZPE 76 (1989) pp. 7-10. "R.G.'s article was written under the impression that it reaches a conclusion contrary to my own. I am glad to say that it does not."
bibl.seg: Haslam Michael W., On the Life of Aesop: A Clarification.

Replies to: Rosa Giannattasio, Su due recenti papiri della Vita di Esopo, ZPE 76 (1989) pp. 7-10. "R.G.'s article was written under the impression that it reaches a conclusion contrary to my own. I am glad to say that it does not."
